text: An appliance is a machine that only has limited functionality. A prosthesis is an example. Many appliances need electricity to work. *Household appliances can be used for cleaning (like the vacuum cleaner) or cooking. If they are easy to carry around, they are small appliances. *Major appliances are big machines like dishwashers and refrigerators. *A Fire appliance is the name of a fire engine the firefighters use to extinguish a fire == References == Category:Machines
title: Appliance
